00037 #ifndef SVN_VER
00038 #define SVN_VER 0
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #ifndef SVN_DATE
00042 #define SVN_DATE Not from a svn checkout
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 // The marvels of the C pre-processor...
00046 #define CAJ_EXPAND(x) #x
00047 #define CAJ_STRING(x) CAJ_EXPAND(x)
00048 
00049 #define SVN_DATE_STRING CAJ_STRING(SVN_DATE)

00259 /* @help switches;-varorder Example
00260 To use smallest domain first ordering (probably the most sensible of
00261 the available orderings) do:
00262 
00263    minion -varorder sdf myinput.minion
00264 */
00265 
00302 //%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
00303 //Entrance:
00304 //%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
00305 
00306 void help(string request);
00307 
00308 void print_default_help(char** argv)
00309 {
00310   cout << "Type '" << argv[0] << " help' for usage." << endl;
00311   cout << endl << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " {switch}* [input file]" << endl;
00312   help("switches");
00313   cout << endl;
00314   cout << "This version of Minion was built with internal checking " <<
00315 #ifdef NO_DEBUG
00316   "off" << endl;
00317 #else
00318   "on" << endl;
00319 #endif
00320   cout << "The following preprocessor flags were active:" << endl;
00321   print_macros();
00322   cout << "The following constraints were compiled in:" << endl;
00323   print_constraints();
00324 }
00325 
00326 
00327 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00328 // Wrap main in a try/catch just to stop exceptions leaving main,
00329 // as windows gets really annoyed when that happens.
00330 
00331 try {
00332   StateObj* stateObj = new StateObj();
00333 
00334   getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().startClock();
00335 
00336   if (argc == 1) {
00337     getOptions(stateObj).printLine("# " + to_string(VERSION));
00338     getOptions(stateObj).printLine("# Svn version: " + to_string(SVN_VER));
00339     print_default_help(argv);
00340     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00341   }
00342 
00343   if(!strcmp(argv[1], "help")) {
00344     std::string sect("");
00345     if(argc != 2) {
00346       for(size_t i = 2; i < argc - 1; i++)
00347         sect.append(argv[i]).append(" ");
00348       sect.append(argv[argc - 1]);
00349     }
00350     help(sect);
00351     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00352   } else {
00353   }
00354 
00355   CSPInstance instance;
00356   SearchMethod args;
00357 
00358   parse_command_line(stateObj, args, argc, argv);
00359 
00360   if(getOptions(stateObj).outputType != -1)
00361     getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().setOutputType(getOptions(stateObj).outputType);
00362 
00363   getOptions(stateObj).printLine("# " + to_string(VERSION));
00364   getOptions(stateObj).printLine("# Svn version: " + to_string(SVN_VER));
00365 
00366   if (!getOptions(stateObj).silent)
00367   {
00368 
00369     getOptions(stateObj).printLine("# Svn last changed date: " + to_string(SVN_DATE_STRING) );
00370 
00371     time_t rawtime;
00372     time(&rawtime);
00373     cout << "#  Run at: UTC " << asctime(gmtime(&rawtime)) << endl;
00374     cout << "#    http://minion.sourceforge.net" << endl;
00375     cout << "#  Minion is still very new and in active development." << endl;
00376     cout << "#  If you have problems with Minion or find any bugs, please tell us!" << endl;
00377     cout << "#  Mailing list at: https://mail.cs.st-andrews.ac.uk/mailman/listinfo/mug" << endl;
00378     cout << "# Input filename: " << getOptions(stateObj).instance_name << endl;
00379     cout << "# Command line: " ;
00380     for (int i=0; i < argc; ++i) { cout << argv[i] << " " ; }
00381     cout << endl;
00382   }
00383 
00384   instance = readInputFromFile(getOptions(stateObj).instance_name, getOptions(stateObj).parser_verbose);
00385 
00386   if(getOptions(stateObj).graph)
00387   {
00388     GraphBuilder graph(instance);
00389     //graph.g.output_graph();
00390     graph.g.output_nauty_graph(instance);
00391     exit(0);
00392   }
00393 
00394   if(getOptions(stateObj).redump)
00395   {
00396     MinionInstancePrinter printer(instance);
00397     printer.build_instance();
00398     cout << printer.getInstance();
00399     exit(0);
00400   }
00401 
00402   getState(stateObj).setTupleListContainer(instance.tupleListContainer);
00403 
00404   // Copy args into tableout
00405   getTableOut().set("RandomSeed", to_string(args.random_seed));
00406   {   const char * b = "";
00407     switch (args.preprocess) {
00408       case PropLevel_None:
00409         b = "None"; break;
00410       case PropLevel_GAC:
00411         b = "GAC"; break;
00412       case PropLevel_SAC:
00413         b = "SAC"; break;
00414       case PropLevel_SSAC:
00415         b = "SSAC"; break;
00416       case PropLevel_SACBounds:
00417         b = "SACBounds"; break;
00418       case PropLevel_SSACBounds:
00419         b = "SSACBounds"; break;
00420     }
00421     getTableOut().set("Preprocess", string(b));
00422   }
00423   // should be one for varorder as well.
00424   getTableOut().set("MinionVersion", SVN_VER);
00425   getTableOut().set("TimeOut", 0); // will be set to 1 if a timeout occurs.
00426   getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().maybePrintTimestepStore(Output_Always, "Parsing Time: ", "ParsingTime", getTableOut(), !getOptions(stateObj).silent);
00427 
00428   BuildCSP(stateObj, instance);
00429   SolveCSP(stateObj, instance, args);
00430 
00431   delete stateObj;
00432 
00433   return 0;
00434 
00435 }
00436 catch(...)
00437 { cerr << "Minion exited abnormally via an exception." << endl; }
00438 }
